metadata.title: CVE-2019-14532 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in The Sleuth Kit (TSK) 4.6.6. There is an off-by-one overwrite due to an underflow on tools/hashtools/hfind.cpp while using a bogus hash table.

criterions.comment: sleuthkit package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
